thrust::system::tbb::tag Struct Reference

#include <memory.h>

Detailed Description

tbb::tag is type representing Thrust's TBB backend system in C++'s type system. Iterators "tagged" with a type which is convertible to tbb::tag assert that they may be "dispatched" to algorithm implementations in the tbb system.

tbb::tag is convertible to cpp::tag.

The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
  • system/tbb/memory.h
